keyMoments.title: Luffy's Devil Fruit Weakness Exploited
keyMoments.description: Luffy's Devil Fruit weakness to water is exploited by Hody Jones, who bursts his air bubble and causes him to begin drowning in the ocean.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the severe disadvantage Devil Fruit users face in water, particularly against opponents who are fish-men. This is one of the most life-threatening situations caused by Luffy's Devil Fruit curse.

reveals.information: The episode dramatically showcases the deadly consequences of a Devil Fruit user fighting underwater against a fish-man

keyMoments.title: Vander Decken's Targeted Attack on Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken uses his Mark-Mark Fruit powers to launch a barrage of projectiles that automatically target Shirahoshi after she rejects his marriage proposal.
keyMoments.significance: Continues to demonstrate the persistent threat Vander Decken poses to Shirahoshi through his Devil Fruit ability.

keyMoments.title: Hody Stabs Decken to Deactivate Powers
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones fatally stabs Vander Decken with the intention of killing him to deactivate his Mark-Mark Fruit powers, which would cause Noah to drop directly onto Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: This reveals a critical weakness of Devil Fruit powers - they deactivate upon the user's death. Hody attempts to exploit this to weaponize Noah's fall.

reveals.information: Hody's plan reveals that Devil Fruit powers deactivate when the user dies, which would cause Noah to fall
